website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic bottom-freezer refrigerator from a leader in the industry, this model is exceptionally large with a broad range of desirable features.
pros: Freezer compartment pulls out for quick access
Includes dispenser for ice and water on exterior door
Multiple shelves, precise temperature control, and spacious interior are top selling points

website_summaries.verdict: With nearly 30 cubic feet of storage, this huge fridge is great for a large family.
pros: Lots of shelves and drawers in both the fridge and freezer
Narrow ice maker on the door leaves space for shelving to give extra storage
Includes on-door water and ice dispenser to save energy
cons: It will cost more than other models, but also offers more

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly fast, professional and free delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent refrigerator. Cannot say enough about the superb delivery and installation service. They confirmed by phone and email, arrived in the middle of the scheduled three hour window, removed the old fridge and installed the new one in less than a half hour. Very courteous and professional. Cleaned up every scrap of packing and tape. Note in the picture that this Model 71329 is only high in the front, where door hinges are. The fridge fits nicely under my standard cabinet. Description or specs should state the height of the back of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D. Spink

customer_reviews.title: Long Time Kenmore Appliance User
customer_reviews.text: So far everything works just as described. Chose this model as it was one of Consumer Reports top 3 four door refrigerators. The ice/water fill opening is large enough to handle a large Yeti cup. My wife likes that the upper compartment is big enough to put the most often used items on the right side and seldom have to open the other side. This cuts down on the loss of cool air.
customer_reviews.author: jMc99

customer_reviews.title: Very frustrated and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken on arrival Tech came out to fix a week later and he could not fix it . Very frustrating not having a refrigerator with six kids and having to wait another week for a new refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: Energy efficient, quiet operation
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this model based on its rating in Consumer Reports. It uses less electricity than our old one, and we really like the bright lighting. It is easy to see what is on every shelf. The ice maker is quiet. The temperature controls for the freezer and interior are accurate, no more guessing with dials that are numbered from 1 - 5. We expect to get many years of use from it.
customer_reviews.author: Glynn in Plano

customer_reviews.title: Awsome !
customer_reviews.text: Refrigerator is great, delivery with setup was excellent and cheaper than I could have bought it store.
customer_reviews.author: cehalll

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: The repair times for this purchase is M-F 8am -3:300m. There are no weekend options available. I work M-F and will have to take 4 hours off to be there for the repair. I don't have the vacation time to take off from work. I spoke with 2 different customer service personnel. They would not find a repair technician that could meet me at 4pm or on a Saturday. So I am stuck with a $2,000 refrigerator that is defective its only 8 months old and a warranty that I can not use. I would not have bought had I known about the repair schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Zen is a Beautiful Thing

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: The door hasnt worked correctly since we received the refrigerator, the compressor starting can be heard across the room while the tv is on, it constantly makes loud noises. Had a tech come out he ordered door parts but he CANNOT touch the compressor unless it fails completely at which point you lose all your food while waiting days or weeks for tech to return to tell you that yourmom compressor is dead. Then you can live without a refrigerator while waiting for a new one. Simple answer dont buy items like this thru amazon
customer_reviews.author: Payingconsumer

customer_reviews.title: Loving It So Far
customer_reviews.text: I love my new refrigerator mostly because it's slick, clean as a whistle and new. But there are some design flaws. When you want to pull out the vegetable drawer, which is on the left upper side, you have to open both top doors because it will run into the right door if you don't open both. Also, the plastic on shelving and drawers is a little thin and I can see it breaking without too much effort. No kids here though, thank goodness. Lots of bells and whistles operated by computer chips so god help us when something goes wrong, in the future. Sure is nice to have right now though.
customer_reviews.author: Plato Closeted

customer_reviews.title: the door bar is shoddy and the door seal is a pain to maintain
customer_reviews.text: The fridge is ok, for the money. The issue is that the part that covers the gap between the right and left door is poorly assembled. To cause the bar to catch the proper groove you need to manually lift it. Unfortunately for me, i just dealt with it, by manually lifting the bar every time i close the fridge, and now the warranty has passed. Dont buy this. Its not a bargain and you can find more dependable appliances for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Kenmore is great
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with my refrigerator and the delivery service. Please note that you must have a water shut off valve. The delivery service will not connect the water line if you do not have this valve. Also, the deliver service will not drill holes into your cabinet to feed the new water line. This was not an issue for me because I drilled my own hole for the new water line. My old water line was thin and the new line is thick, so I had to make the existing hole in my cabinet bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Sarita Singh

customer_reviews.title: Ice maker has design defects - Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Right when the warranty ran out, our ice maker started freezing up Turns out it has a systemic leak, that has continued to get worse and worse Now - within a week of spending two hours to thaw it out, it is frozen up and stops working - yet again This appliance is less than two years old -
customer_reviews.author: HappyAstronomer

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge!
customer_reviews.text: We could not be happier. Great price, great fridge, and it looks fantastic in our kitchen. The guys who delivered it took out old one out, took the door off the new one so it would fit through the door, hooked up the water line, let me clean the floor before putting it back, all in less than 20 minutes. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your Money!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. I purchased this in April of 2018. Last week, it died. Amazon said to take it up with Kenmore. Kenmore said certain parts may be covered but labor will not. They can not send a technician out for over a week to diagnose the problem at $80-$100 just to diagnose. So disappointed that a $2000 refrigerator would stop working after 13 months and even more disappointed to find out that apparently this is a known problem with this model. Don’t waste your money. I am only giving it a one star because I can not give it less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and the crew carried it down our steep entry. They took our old fridge too along with all of the packing materials the new unit came with.
customer_reviews.author: Fremen

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and accessable.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, lots of interior space. The drawer bottom freezer is convenient. Highly rated by Consumer Reports, we have come to rely on their recommendations. We choose not to hook up the in freezer ice maker, as there s ample room for ice trays to dump in the ice makers ice container. My wife and I like this fridge very much, we are sure you will too.
customer_reviews.author: Vern

customer_reviews.title: Amazon does not back its products and is letting down it’s customers and tarnishing it’s name
customer_reviews.text: The ice maker worked for a while then quit. I bought a 3 year warranty and they came to fix it after waiting for several weeks for a service appointment on June 11. It worked one day after that. Of course then I had to wait another month for a service appointment. Been buying ice for months! Now I’ve waited 5 1/2 hours for service appointment, no show since 1pm. Amazon should have more respect for customers than Sears. Shame on amazon. Not letting this go
customer_reviews.author: Susan Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Love the layout, delivery was awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery people (Innovation) people were awesome! They were in and out in 30 minutes, and they had a few things to deal with. As info, since Amazon cust svc didnt know, this particular delivery service always includes the ice maker hose. I bought just in case, but they included it and hooked it all up! Very very professional and efficient delivery! Love the space in the fridge & freezer. So far so good! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lowrie

customer_reviews.title: don't buy the extended warranty from Kenmore
customer_reviews.text: We like the refrigerator .Quiet, seems energy efficient,great interior lighting,Crisper drawers keep deli meats and veggies fresh for a long time. We thought we'd invest the savings from purchase in an extended warranty from Kenmore. Got a email from Kenmore months later saying that unless I could prove we had purchased the refrigerator, they would cancel the warranty and send our money back. They gave a contact to use which we could not,in fact reach anyone, and we have not heard from them since, nor have we gotten a refund. Bad business
customer_reviews.author: gaweston

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Quiet and really nice
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Quiet and really nice. Install people were great too. Just about 2 months in at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Twin Striped

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable Install!
customer_reviews.text: Very concerned ordering and having a major appliance installed by Amazon for the first time, It wont be my last! The two Gentlemen that installed the Fridge were Awesome! Professional, Polite, measured everything before bringing in the appliance. They had to bring it up a staircase and never even came close to touching a wall. They removed the old one with the same grace. The whole install was complete in under 30 minutes.. The Kenmore fridge is working great. I would Highly recommend this service Amazon is offering. Also Hands down Best price on the web for this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: It showed up fairly quickly, it's got some interesting settings and storage. The only thing it didn't actually do was get cold. So we sent it back. With the future of Sears in question, that was probably a very good move. Maybe Amazon is the wrong place to buy appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Gold

customer_reviews.title: Great frog
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big refrigerator. Stays cold and freezer freezes cubes in less than an hour. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JaeMarie

customer_reviews.title: It...is a fridge
customer_reviews.text: Bought on prime day to replace our old fridge. Front door is not metal so no magnets stick, shame. Ice maker and water dispenser works like a dream. French door is nice. Good interior space. Has a freezer drawer that is useful for your more used feeezables.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great refrigerator!
customer_reviews.text: A few people had some negative things to say so I was hesitant to get this one but all of the refrigerators had some negative reviews. I like it a lot! It has a lot more room then my side by side. It is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Broke down in less than two years.
customer_reviews.text: Inside component defroster defective after 21 months. $400 to repair, but part will take months to receive ordered part. I would have to buy another fridge if I didn't already have a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Angerer

customer_reviews.title: The left door has to be pushed into place to ...
customer_reviews.text: The left door has to be pushed into place to close (probably intended to seal in the cold) but it ends up not getting closed properly as people are quickly in and out. I've come into the kitchen to find the door ajar multiple times. The finish seems to be not-quite-right too, and it's difficult to get fingerprints off. I've had stainless steel before (Kenmore Elite) and didn't have this problem. It's mostly ok. Drawers are kinda cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: mmmmm

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is just what we wanted. Perfect size and has everything we need. Also it is magnetic! Amazon was wonderful and we received the fridge in 2 days from a great delivery team!! Buy it here and do not go to the sears outlet. Its worth a little extra money to not deal with Sears. I promise you.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be running fine though.
customer_reviews.text: It started making a loud noise when the compressor starts up. Seems to be running fine though.
customer_reviews.author: TheGlenFam2010

customer_reviews.title: Kenmore 4673022 Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased new, 15 months later the fridge dies and I am waiting for a repair estimate. No warrantly coverage. I do not recommend this fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: should be rated 5 star''''great refrig..
customer_reviews.text: the best unit we have ever bought,the lower drawer in the refrig section wide and deep. unit is so quite.the best value available ' and we did a lot of shopping..the best delivery and setup, we can not get over the big freezer storage..this unit is the best.
customer_reviews.author: richard whalen

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 year, 9 months old, and freezer and ice maker stopped working suddenly, overnight. No power outage. It is and has been on, refrigerator works, all lights on, no indication there was anything wrong.
customer_reviews.author: jerry legg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fridge. Lots of room. The delivery was wonderful, the guys were friendly and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Klick

customer_reviews.title: Great Fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fridge. We’ve had it for 3 months and it runs great! One thing to note, if you need to hold more than one gallon of milk, you’ll have to adjust the interior shelving. This is NOT a large fridge. It fits in small spaces but still holds a decent amount of food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Part,  the ease of picking on line and getting it thru AMAZON !.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery by Amazon thirds party was out standing. Beat the rest, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Got it three weeks ago and love it so far. Loads of space, very conveniently laid out. Ice & water maker work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer 28736

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This model is made by LG in Korea. Great Quality!! The inside is almost same with LG refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: It didn't fit for us but they were great about returning it and refunding our money
customer_reviews.text: It didn't fit for us but they were great about returning it and refunding our money. Had it fit - we would have loved it! Thank you for being flexible for a difficult space in our house. I love Amazon and highly recommend them for appliances. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: madtownmom

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room and great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this fridge. Have had it for on set 6 months and it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Kenmore refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: My friends told me it gutsy to order a Kenmore refrigerator on Amazon, but that is the only place I could find exactly what I needed (size, color, etc). So far, I love my new fridge. Delivery was efficient and professional. All is good!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge freezer!!
customer_reviews.text: Great refrigerator. We have lots more room in the freezer now!!
customer_reviews.author: C D Anderson

customer_reviews.title: water tip freezes up every now and then and wont dispense water but other than that the fridge is good so far and we are about two weeks into ...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of space for a 30" fridge, Ice Maker "leaks" ice if door is closed too hard, water tip freezes up every now and then and wont dispense water but other than that the fridge is good so far and we are about two weeks into it.....Oh and the exterior clean up is tricky guess thats why black stainless in starting to gain steam in the market finger prints on the doors show up like headlights at night and if you dont clean them correctly the stainless steel streaks up real nicely...
customer_reviews.author: DeMac

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this frig September 2018, today November 2019 and already broken. The freezer isn't cool enough stuff start to melt.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Vu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Great product. So much space and easy to see what’s in your refrigerator
customer_reviews.author: Fuller

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: We just took delivery a month or so ago. We are delighted so far. Pretty nice ice box!
customer_reviews.author: @earth2tim

customer_reviews.title: New Kenmore Elite Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Old fridge died after 20 years. Didn't realize what improvements are now "standard". Too soon to tell about new fridge, but so far I'm thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: jep

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: The best refrigerator I bought ,Every time i open it i say love this fridge
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery with free haul away. Item was priced well
customer_reviews.author: Melb

customer_reviews.title: Simple and we'll designed.
customer_reviews.text: Great fridge. Bought it sight unseen and liked it more than all the fridges we saw at Home Depot and Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: The Bull Dance

customer_reviews.title: Do not by appliances online!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, selected the size and color I wanted. According to picture looked black/grey matte color. Arrived gloss black and had a cheesy display. What do I do now? I already removed all the food and the installers moved the old fridge out and brought the new one in. I had no choice but to keep it they said that it was the same as on the order sheet. Which was true. It just didn't match the picture! I have little choice on what size refrigerator I can install in my space and it was a "good" deal so I guess I'm keeping it. It runs good and quiet just want to warn others be-careful buying site unseen.
customer_reviews.author: JasonMc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great appliance and great experience with Amazon Delivery. Went above and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Victor C Doherty IV

customer_reviews.title: Not a week old and already broken
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed. It's already broken. An otherwise fine fridge.
customer_reviews.author: ⭐LibbyMcK

customer_reviews.title: Very good machine for the price
customer_reviews.text: The fridge is spacious and well organized. I prefer the freezer on the bottom as it loses less cold when you open it. The delivery service was prompt and professional. They managed to get the new one and the old one out under difficult conditions. The old LG fridge crapped out just after the regular warranty ran out so I bought the extended warranty for the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Barrie Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, cold and well lit. Plenty of space ...
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, cold and well lit. Plenty of space. My suggestion to Kenmore is to add a toggle for the temperature display so it shows both set and actual temperature. As it is it only shows set temp. Maybe they could set up so holding temp button 3 seconds shows actual.
customer_reviews.author: TBSportPix

product_meta.title: Kenmore 4673029 Alexa Capabilities 04673029 26.1 cu.ft. Non-Dispense French Door Refrigerator, Black, cu. ft
product_meta.description: Size:26.1 cu. ft.| Color:BlackWith the Kenmore 26.1 cubic feet French Door Refrigerator with Bottom-Freezer, not only are you getting an exceptionally well-made and reliable appliance, you're also getting an appliance that takes care of all of your family's food storage needs. You'll be amazed at the storage capacity of this large fridge. The refrigerator has dual evaporators that cool the refrigerator and freezer separately to keep each section at the ideal temperature and humidity level. For easy access to your bulkier food items, gallon-sized door bins give you space for containers of juice, milk, and taller items. The full width pantry drawer has room for extra-large items, like veggie trays and party platters. With its easy-care wipe clean exterior and interior tempered glass shelves, this French door refrigerator is a welcome addition to any kitchen space. For convenient frozen food storage, the frost-free freezer protects your frozen leftovers from freezer burn and keeps food fresher longer. You'll always have ice at the ready with a built-in ice maker. A built-in ice maker keeps fresh ice at your fingertips, so you can whip up smoothies, cocktails, and more in a flash. The French door refrigerator measures 35.38” W x 35.9” D x 68.58” H.
feature_bullets: Item includes room of choice delivery, unboxing, item hook-up (including required parts) and free optional haul-away at checkout

26.1 cubic foot refrigerator has dual evaporators that cool the refrigerator and freezer separately to keep each section at the ideal temperature and humidity level. Full Width Pantry Drawer has room for extra large items like veggie trays and party platters.
Gallon-sized door bins give you space for gallon containers of juice and milk and taller items
Frost-free freezer so you frozen food stays fresher longer
Item dimensions are length 35.38 by width 35.9 by height 68.58 inches. Measure the available space to ensure the item will fit.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars288 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
